verses.roman:
nityānanda lañā bhikṣā karite vaisa tumi
vaiṣṇavera pariveśana karitechi āmi

synonyms: nityānanda lañā—taking along Śrī Nityānanda Prabhu; bhikṣā—luncheon; karite—to take; vaisa—sit down; tumi—You; vaiṣṇavera—to all the devotees; pariveśana—distribution of prasāda; karitechi—am doing; āmi—I.
translation: "You may sit down and accept the luncheon with Nityānanda Prabhu, and I shall distribute the prasāda to all the Vaiṣṇavas."
